projects.title: Centralized Power BI Dashboard for Database Operations
projects.description: Designed a unified dashboard for real-time monitoring of Jira, server, and database activities. Integrated Snowflake SQL queries and automated data retrieval via Azure Portal APIs. Collaborated with DBA teams to replace manual tracking with live visual analytics.

projects.title: UDeploy Pipeline Migration to Jenkins
projects.description: Migrated deployment pipelines from UDeploy to Jenkins, ensuring continuous delivery reliability. Automated CI/CD processes using Bash scripting and documented workflow for onboarding.

projects.title: Database Operations
projects.description: Managed database access controls, patching, and Azure rehydration tasks for operational stability and compliance.
